backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic for user profiles, jobs, chat, payouts, applications, and access control with helper functions for roles and job participation.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping PWA-related UI features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists brief summaries of major frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and PWA-related utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes using an OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest loading, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying name, icons, colors, start URL, and display settings for JobConnect.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page informing users of connectivity loss with a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, and network-first fetch handling for PWA functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with routing, authentication flow, service worker registration, and global PWA install provider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with layout elements including offline banner, navbar, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Renders authenticated navigation with links, PWA install trigger, and a mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Displays an alert banner when the browser goes offline by listening to online/offline events.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallInstr: Shows platform-specific PWA installation instructions with copyable app URL and tabbed content.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallPr: Manages PWA install prompts, detects installation state, and exposes install actions with a fallback dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Combines identity, actor, and profile queries to derive current user state and role flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Simple hook exposing the PWA install context from PwaInstallProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, jobs, applications, chat messages, and payouts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, safe-area padding, and mobile tap target improvements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Provides a chat interface for job participants, loading messages, sending new ones, and showing conversation history.
frontend/src/pages/CreateJobPage.tsx: Form page for job owners to create new jobs with validation and submission via the createJob mutation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a personalized dashboard summarizing jobs, applications, and actions based on the user’s role.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed job info, handles applying, assigning workers, completing jobs, rating owners, and marking payouts as paid.
frontend/src/pages/JobListPage.tsx: Shows a filtered list of jobs, separating owner-managed jobs from open jobs and displaying basic job metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile editing, displays job and payout stats, and supports PWA install and principal copying.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Allows new users to enter profile details and choose a role before saving their initial profile.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Landing page that lets users log in, install the PWA, and view introductory information before entering the app.
frontend/src/utils/pwaInstall.ts: Provides helper functions for detecting platform, checking PWA installation state, and copying text to clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s PWA-related goals, existing features, and pending requests for adding install support and instructions.
